Title: Aynabaji
Writer: Syed Gaosul Alam Shaon (story), Anam Biswas (dialogue), Adnan Adib Khan (dialogue), Anam Biswas (screenplay), Syed Gaosul Alam Shaon (screenplay)
Actors: Chanchal Chowdhury, Masuma Rahman Nabila, Bijori Barkatullah, Partho Barua
Plot: Ayna is an actor and the prison is his stage. He slips into the characters of the powerful convicted in exchange of money and take their place in prison. This strange profession is borne ...
